title: Garuda Kasir
description: Garuda Kasir is a comprehensive point-of-sale (POS) system designed to streamline your business operations. Our platform offers a range of features to manage sales, inventory, and customer relationships efficiently.
shortDesc: Garuda Kasir is a comprehensive point-of-sale (POS) system designed to streamline your business operations.

title: Masonry Image Gallery
description: Masonry Image is a dynamic and visually appealing image gallery designed to showcase your photos in a stylish and organized layout. Using the masonry grid system, our website arranges images of varying sizes seamlessly, creating a stunning visual experience.
shortDesc: Masonry Image is a dynamic and visually appealing image gallery designed to showcase your photos in a stylish and organized layout.

title: Minimalist E-Commerce
description: Minimalist E-Commerce is a sleek and modern online store designed with a clean user interface and smooth shopping experience. Built with performance in mind, it features a well-structured product display, seamless navigation, and responsive design to ensure accessibility across all devices. This project showcases my skills in front-end development, UI/UX design, and integrating e-commerce functionalities.
shortDesc: Minimalist E-Commerce is a sleek and modern online store designed with a clean user interface and smooth shopping experience.

title: Landing Page PPPM Miftahul Huda
description: This website is a modern and responsive platform designed for PPPM Miftahul Huda, an educational institution dedicated to nurturing students with both academic and religious knowledge. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance, the site ensures a seamless and fast user experience.
shortDesc: Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance, the site ensures a seamless and fast user experience.
